original_text: Jesus said, ‘Go on asking God for what you need. Then God will give it to you. Go on looking for what you need. Then you will find it. Go on knocking at the door, and God will open it for you.
korean_text: 구하라 그리하면 너희에게 주실 것이요 찾으라 그리하면 찾아낼 것이요 문을 두드리라 그리하면 너희에게 열릴 것이니

sentences.original_text: Go on asking God for what you need
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 필요한 것을 계속해서 하나님께 구하라

sentences.original_text: Then God will give it to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님께서 그것을 너에게 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Go on looking for what you need
Go on knocking at the door
and God will open it for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님께서 그것을 너를 위해 열어주실 것이다
